sentence: Especially notable among Trump's nine other endorsements for the Michigan state legislature is Mike Detmer, who appeared jointly with gubernatorial candidate Ryan Kelley on January 29, 2022.
author: Steven Harper
title: State Candidates and the 'Trump Ticket'He Said the Quiet Part Out Loud Again

sentence: When Mr. Trump invited candidates from Michigan to stand beside him at one event, a man's voice rang out: I'm running for governor, too, can I come up there?? It was Ryan Kelley.
title: Mar-a-Lago Machine: Trump as a Modern-Day Party Boss
